alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Claiborne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Claiborne and northeastern Campbell Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Follette, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Follette, Jacksboro, Fincastle, White Oak and Clairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
